quote_last: . Hanley nodded to the chief housing officer. “Proceed,” he said. The council officer approached the door of the house and knocked loudly.
title: No Comebacks
author: Frederick Forsyth

quote_first: We were rolling down an expressway, somewhere, but rain was clouding the view of the skyline so that I couldn’t orient myself to where we were. The glowing numbers of the dashboard clock said that it was only
title: Fool Moon
author: Jim Butcher

quote_last: lay in bed, staring at ceiling.
title: A Fraction of the Whole
